meanings.definition: Aromatic hydrocarbons containing a six-membered ring with alternating double bonds.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study benzenes to understand their unique structure.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled a sample of benzenes carefully.
meanings.sent3: The benzenes in the lab seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of thoughts, like a complex web of benzenes.
meanings.sent5: The smell of benzenes lingered in the air, reminding her of the chemistry lesson.
